Article.Title: Transfers or disclosures not authorised by Union law

Content.Definition: Any judgment of a court or tribunal and any decision of an administrative authority of a third country requiring a controller or processor to transfer or disclose personal data.
Conditions: May only be recognised or enforceable if based on an international agreement.
International agreement must be in force between the requesting third country and the Union or a Member State.
Without prejudice to other grounds for transfer pursuant to this Chapter.
